mapper.insert: insert into t_lsc_vendor_goodsprice (c_gid, c_vid, f_price, dt_begin, dt_end, i_status, c_comment) values (#{cGid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cVid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dtBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dtEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{iStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{cComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select c_gid, c_vid, f_price, dt_begin, dt_end, i_status, c_comment from t_lsc_vendor_goodsprice
